name: Jedeš pozdě na klauzuru a zapomněl jsi na prezentaci simulátor
name_original: Jedeš pozdě na klauzuru a zapomněl jsi na prezentaci simulátor
description:
"You're late for class and you forgot the presentation simulator" or JPKZPSimulator for short was created as team semester work of our first-year students. The assignment was to create a small and easy game with interesting mechanics to celebrate the 20-year anniversary of the Faculty of Multimedia Communications at Tomas Bata University in Zlín.

Authors:
Vojtěch Štajer
Petr Medveď
Lucie Gajdošová
Volha Kurakova
Lukáš Pešek
Filip Vojtěch

Supervision:
Pavel Novák
Michal Ščugulík
